name: Formula Frosty
description:
This was a project I worked on as a Level- / Game designer, during my study at Breda University of Applied Science.

The game was made with a team of 12 - 15 people.  The idea started out during a game marmalade [ game jam] we had as a project, and then turned into this. 

Formula Frosty is a Multiplayer racing game, with up to 4 players can race at the same time. players need to make sure they cross the finish line first. However, they can also hinder their opponents by shooting snowballs at them and knocking them away.
